mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, subquery.* FROM ( SELECT m.MEMBER_ID, m.MEMBER_NICKNAME, s.MEMBER_NUMBER, s.SPONSOR_AMOUNT, TO_CHAR(s.SPONSOR_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SPONSOR_DATE FROM TBL_SPONSOR s JOIN TBL_MEMBER m ON s.MEMBER_NUMBER = m.MEMBER_NUMBER ORDER BY s.SPONSOR_DATE DESC ) subquery ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
